subject: Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: A court in Stuttgart, Germany, cleared the defending champion Paolo Bettini to compete in tomorrow’s world championship road race despite Bettini’s refusal to sign an anti-doping pledge.
snippet: A court in Stuttgart, Germany, cleared the defending champion Paolo Bettini to compete in tomorrow’s world championship road race despite Bettini’s refusal to sign an anti-doping pledge.
